mapper.sql: select top 100 percent id,sewageid,testingtime,equip1normaltime,equip1abnormaltime,equip2normaltime,equip2abnormaltime,equip3normaltime,equip3abnormaltime,equip4normaltime,equip4abnormaltime,equip5normaltime,equip5abnormaltime,detection1avg,detection1min,detection1max,detection2avg,detection2min,detection2max,detection3avg,detection3min,detection3max,detection4avg,detection4min,detection4max,detection5avg,detection5min,detection5max,equip6normaltime,equip6abnormaltime,equip7normaltime,equip7abnormaltime,equip8normaltime,equip8abnormaltime,equip9normaltime,equip9abnormaltime,equip10normaltime,equip10abnormaltime,equip11normaltime,equip11abnormaltime,equip12normaltime,equip12abnormaltime,equip13normaltime,equip13abnormaltime,equip14normaltime,equip14abnormaltime,equip15normaltime,equip15abnormaltime,equip16normaltime,equip16abnormaltime,equip17normaltime,equip17abnormaltime,equip18normaltime,equip18abnormaltime,equip19normaltime,equip19abnormaltime,equip20normaltime,equip20abnormaltime,equip21normaltime,equip21abnormaltime,equip22normaltime,equip22abnormaltime,equip23normaltime,equip23abnormaltime,equip24normaltime,equip24abnormaltime,detection6avg,detection6min,detection6max,detection7avg,detection7min,detection7max,detection8avg,detection8min,detection8max,detection9avg,detection9min,detection9max,detection10avg,detection10min,detection10max,detection11avg,detection11min,detection11max,detection12avg,detection12min,detection12max,detection13avg,detection13min,detection13max,detection14avg,detection14min,detection14max,detection15avg,detection15min,detection15max,detection16avg,detection16min,detection16max from statistic_day where 1=1

select sewage.name as sewagename,area.name,statistic_day.* from statistic_day,sewage,area where sewage.sewageID = statistic_day.sewageid and sewage.areaID = area.id and #{testingtime} = CONVERT(varchar(11),testingtime,120) and area.id = #{areaid}

select sewage.name as sewagename,area.name,statistic_day.* from statistic_day,sewage,area where sewage.sewageID = statistic_day.sewageid and sewage.areaID = area.id and #{testingtime} = CONVERT(varchar(11),testingtime,120) and area.id = #{areaid}
